hadith.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Amr ibn al-'As: The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) preached and said: Abstain from avarice, for those who had been before you were annihilated due to avarice. It (avarice) commanded them to show niggardliness; it commanded them to cut off their relationship with their nearest relatives, so they cut off. It commanded them to show profligacy, so they showed it
